commit.message:
* expmed.c (expand_shift): If SHIFT_COUNT_TRUNCATED, drop a SUBREG.

From-SVN: r17107

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,7 @@

+	* expmed.c (expand_shift): If SHIFT_COUNT_TRUNCATED, drop a SUBREG.
